title: Hannah B. Admits To Having Sex More Than 4 Times In One Night In This Sour Candy Challenge
text:
From Delish

The Bachelorette and Dancing With the Stars' Hannah Brown visits Delish to play Suck It Up. She answers "Never have I ever..." questions about her sex life, what went on behind the scenes, and her food choices—all while eating the most sour candy you can buy.

Never have I ever...had a crush on my dance partner.

I haven't had a crush on my dance partner because I don't even know my dance partner for Dancing With the Stars, if that's what we're talking about. Maybe I will have a crush on my dance partner! We shall see! You should watch! And you should vote! For me!

Never have I ever...missed Luke P.

No. No. One more time for the people in the back—no.



Never have I ever...eaten at Cracker Barrel.

Come on! Of course I've eaten at Cracker Barrel. I'm from Alabama. That's where we have Easter! Just kidding.

Never have I ever...used food during foreplay.

Exactly what do you mean by "using food?" I feel like I probably have. I'm sorry. I feel like there was one time I might've used the usuals...sticky stuff and creams [laughs].

Never have I ever...pooped my pants as an adult.

Close calls, but I've not pooped my pants as an adult.

Never have I ever...faked sick to get out of a date.

I have absolutely done this. It wasn't faking, but maybe I've been tired and thought "I don't feel the best." I'll take a candy.

Never have I ever...had sex more than four times in one night.

[Eats candy.] Oh, this one's not that sour? Oh. There it goes. You should not eat these in public.

Never have I ever...slid into a former Bachelor's DMs.

I totally have. But it was before I was on the show and it was actually Colton. We're cool now, so I wonder if he even knows this. I would watch the show when he was on Becca's season or on Paradise and be like "Oh my god, he's so cute," and I would be like "Oh, mom, don't you just love Colton!?" And I would tag him, but I wouldn't like slide into his DMs like "Hey boy, you're so hot." Not like that. So. That's my life.

You Might Also Like
description: Oh, and she does not miss Luke P.
